item.title: I-25 North - Exit 165
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 165 - Glenrock/Rolling Hills. This is the northern end of the Glenrock business loop.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 160
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 160 - BL-25/US-87 North/US-20/US-26 West/Glenrock. This is the southern end of the Glenrock business loop. US-20, US-26, and US-87 leave I-25 northbound here.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 160
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 160 - East Glenrock. This is the eastern end of the Glenrock business loop. US-20/US-26/US-87 rejoin I-25 south here. They leave I-25 here northbound to Casper.
